## Installing developmental version of **DelayedArray**
 
```{r, installBranch, results = 'hide', message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

if(packageVersion('rhdf5') == "2.23.0") {
    devtools::install_github(repo = "grimbough/rhdf5", ref = "5e1f0be", quiet = TRUE, force = TRUE)
}
if(packageVersion('DelayedArray') != "0.5.1.1") {
    devtools::install_github(repo = "grimbough/DelayedArray", ref = "d61695b",  quiet = TRUE, force = TRUE)
}
```

```{r, load-libs, message=FALSE}
library(TENxBrainData)
library(microbenchmark)
options(DelayedArray.block.size=2e9)
```

```{r, load-data, message=FALSE}
tenx <- TENxBrainData()
tenx.sub <- tenx[,1:13000]
```

```{r, save-results}
system.time(res4 <- colSums(counts(tenx.sub)))
save(res4, file = "/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/res4.rda")
```

```{r, run-benchmark}
packageVersion('rhdf5')
packageVersion('DelayedArray')

bm4 <- microbenchmark(colSums(counts(tenx.sub)), 
                      times = 5L, unit = "s",
                      control = list(order = "block", warmup = 0))
bm4$expr <- "DelayedArray+\nrhdf5"
save(bm4, file = "/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/bm4.rda")
bm4
```

sessionInfo()
